author: danj
msg: Changed references to 1.9.0 (pre-2.0) to 2.0.0 M1 ("milestone 1") to
align with Apache naming conventions. We will make a "milestone
release" at the end of the month.

author: joerg
msg: resources did not get released when prepare(..) returns XA_RDONLY as no commit(..) is triggered by the TransactionManager explicitely.

author: jmargaris
msg: changes "tags" to "taghandling" now that directory has changed

author: joerg
msg: Fixed issue with deleteResource(..) and createResource(..) of FileResourceManager seen as read-only operations.
